overview_of_class: Qualitative theory of ordinary differential equations. Linear systems, phase portraits, periodic solutions, stability theory, Lyapunov functions, chaotic differential equations. Prerequisites: 240 and 250 or equivalent.
name: Qualitative Differential Equations
title: WCAS MATH 353-0-81 Qualitative Differential Equations

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Qualitative theory of ordinary differential equations. Linear systems, phase portraits, periodic solutions, stability theory, Lyapunov functions, chaotic differential equations. Prerequisites: 240 and 250 or equivalent.

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: Questions answered on Tuesdays (no tests or quizzes)

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
Elementary Differential Equations, 10th Edition
William Boyce & Richard DiPrima
Wiley
ISBN: 978-0470458327

subject: MATH
